SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Add agent host, port and username to java arguments
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_AGENT_HOST# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -agenthost &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -agentport &UC4RB_HRV_AGENT_PORT#")
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_AGENT_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -agentusername &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Password is decrypted !: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_HRV_AGENT_PASSWORD#" !: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :SET &DECRYPT_COMMAND# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar" ARB -cmd cipher decrypt "&UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#"' UC4_DECRYPTED_AGENT_PWD=`&DECRYPT_COMMAND# | grep "^Decrypted: " | sed 's/^Decrypted: //'` :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX export UC4_DECRYPTED_AGENT_PWD
